name: Loreal gonzalez
coverLetter: I have been trimming medical marijuana for a year now, I work 3 weeks out of the month, sometimes 2 depending how many workers we have. Ive been getting paid hourly and sometimes by the gram. I'm very comfortable with leading a team, I'm confident in my work style and I'm also very flexible with my schedule. I live in Detroit Michigan as a medical marijuana patient, I'm looking to relocate so coming somewhere that will honor my card is very comforting.
